sub_title: Loss Prevention Manager at UNIQLO, Former Military Officer
summary:
Business operations and continuity expert, with a 15+ year background as a military officer, now having transitioned to corporate roles. Outstanding leadership skill set and a track record of leading and executing large-scale business transformation, business continuity, resource management, and talent development programs. A trusted and valued leader, driving results with followership, integrity, discipline and empowered teams. EU passport holder.

---------------------------------
CORE COMPETENCIES

► Business Operations as a Craft
   • Business process audit and reengineering
   • Resource management / optimisation
   • Supply chain management
   • Loss and Prevention
   • Risk assessment & control
   • Crisis management
   • Trained in PMP framework and standards
   • Expertise in safety (prior military officer)

► Industries / Business landscapes
   • Expertise in large scale, high-impact organisations, e.g. National Army Corps and Ministry of Defense
   • Experience in corporate industries, such as retail and hospitality

► Leadership skills
   • Resilience to ambiguity, complexity and resource challenges
   • Influencing skills and ability to navigate complex corporate structures
   • Strong experience in large and matrixed team leadership
   • Expertise in building, training and motivating new teams and making them self-sustained

profile_positions.description:
TEAM STRUCTURE:
Reports to BENELUX COO

ROLE SCOPE:
In charge of loss prevention for multiple locations. Working on inventory control, loss prevention programs, security improvement, building security, and the review of company assets

DETAILS: 
Determine critical LP priorities for span of control by analyzing reporting tool information.
•	Define accountability and achieve results by working with store operation teams
•	Protect assets from loss, theft and operational compliance issues by executing loss prevention and shrinkage control programs
•	Interact with store operation teams to offer feedback on loss prevention programs’ progress
•	Monitors external vendor use of security within span of control
•	Investigates internal theft, incidents ethically and on time
•	Review and analyze shortage results and investigate findings to determine shortage causes and solutions
•	Plan for new stores and emphasize on store environment technology by working with store construction team
•	Determine top priority "Target" stores and place them on high shrink program to guarantee resources and attention
•	Determine store policies for review and amendment for positive changes

RESULTS: 
Standardized loss prevention team structure, control programs and processes, minimized miscommunication and increased operation efficiency. New store opening.
profile_positions.title: Regional Loss Prevention Manager

profile_positions.description:
TEAM STRUCTURE:
Reports to BENELUX Area Manager.

ROLE SCOPE:
Oversee loss prevention staff while supporting the organizations loss prevention procedures and efforts to safeguard company assets, prevent and minimize theft, and reduce shortages and fraud.
•	Hires and trains loss prevention staff.
•	Organizes and oversees the schedules and work of loss prevention staff.
•	Conducts performance evaluations that are timely and constructive.
•	Assists with discipline and termination of employees in accordance with company policy.

DETAILS: 
Develops and delivers loss prevention training program for employees.
•	Oversees the installation of new security equipment such as security tags, mirrors, surveillance cameras, and electronic security devices.
•	Identifies, recommends, and implements systems to minimize loss of merchandise, money, or company assets.
•	Audits and investigates sources of known losses.
•	Monitors inventory to identify theft or shortages.
•	Investigates suspicious customer and/or employee activity.
•	Conducts periodic inspections of stores and facilities to ensure surveillance and security equipment is functioning properly.
•	Prepares reports of effectiveness of established prevention measures.
•	Researches, suggests, and implements additional security measures.

RESULTS: 
Developed loss prevention policies, increased operation efficiency and promoted personal development, leading to maximized profit

profile_positions.description:

Reports to the head of Loss and Prevention.

ROLE SCOPE:
- Preserves company profit by eliminating preventable losses.

DETAILS:

RESULTS:
- Reduced inadvertent loss due to inventory flow errors to zero.

profile_positions.description:
• TEAM STRUCTURE:
Reported to the Crisis Management Chief (Coronel) partnering with the Chief of the Army Corps. Led 2 officers.

• PROJECT SCOPE:
Transformation of military crisis management operations

• DETAILS:
Led an advisory board that provided consultative services to military and civilian senior leadership – e.g. chief of the army, navy and air forces, minister of defense, national intelligence office – in response to military and external affairs crises. Initiated the first holistic decision-making framework, by mapping all stages of a military crisis, researching and documenting crisis response tactics by opponent state and crafting a model to enable fast resource allocation in crisis incidents.

• RESULTS:
Significantly improved the quality of consulting services provided by the crisis advisory board, by streamlining redundant administrative formalities, introducing concurrent streams and ultimately enabling decision-makers to act faster in the first very critical stages of a crisis incident.
profile_positions.title: Captain, Military Crisis Management

profile_positions.description:
• TEAM STRUCTURE:
Reported to the National Defense Corps Enablement Chief (Brigadier). Led a team of 11 officers (line and matrix structure).

• PROJECT SCOPE:
Introduction of a career progression research framework for the military corpses.

• DETAILS:
Built a research framework, to identify integration and enablement barriers that female and male officers experienced in their military careers, related to socioeconomic status, gender, cultural beliefs, etc. Conducted this national research in 2 months, including the full military officers’ corps (approx. 60,000 officers), and shared results with NATO partners, who subsequently used this analysis to compose a military career transformation strategy in NATO member states.
As part of this project, updated the full database of female and male officers of the army, navy and air forces in Greece, ensuring constantly up-to-date and rich workforce data. Incorporated additional qualitative data sets on skills, education, and motives for resigning from a military career, enabling the national defense headquarters to identify workforce enablement and progression opportunities.

• RESULTS:
Effectively conducted research within a very condensed timeframe. Went the extra mile by introducing a military officer talent management pulse and a structured skillset documentation framework.
profile_positions.title: Captain, Equality and Enablement Centre for Infantry, Navy and Army Air Corps

profile_positions.description:
• TEAM STRUCTURE:
Reported to the civilian and military attachés of the Deputy Minister of Defense. Led 17 officers (line and matrix structure).

• PROJECT SCOPE:
Army corps resource management transformation program.

• DETAILS:
- Led a 360 national defense transformation program, whose long term objective was to streamline operational costs by at least 20%. This strategic plan took into consideration human resources, hard military equipment and raw materials and optimized their nationwide allocation.
- Built and led a matrixed transformation team, documented resource allocation situation, decision-making processes and stakeholders and identified opportunities to make better-informed decisions, considering both operational costs and a fair and equal treatment of army officers and servicemen (e.g. gender equality, disabilities, social or family issues).
- Proposed a staggered 1-year and 3-year plan and led its implementation for the first year.

• RESULTS:
Effectively led this transformation program, achieving the desired cost-reduction, and enabling remarkably more efficient decision-making.
